text:
- If you're not familiar
with Choice Hotels,
we are a major hotel brand

that has 22 different
brands under the umbrella.

We have about 7,600
hotels around the world
in about 46 countries.
Personalization's extremely important,

and honestly, the pandemic
switched the world.

What happened is people's
expectations, their desires,
the way they travel, changed.

So through understanding
what they want to do

and meeting them where
they want to be tomorrow,

we can move faster, we
move quicker, we can pivot.
Leveraging the tools that AWS provides,
we're able to innovate
and drive transformation

through how we leverage
that data to drive value.

We're really excited
about unified profiles
of travelers and guests.
Something that we're working with AWS on.

It really transforms how
we can solve a problem
we've had for a long time with guest data.

Another thing that UPT is
really gonna help us out with
is that we look at our loyalty programs

and really personalizing the
experience for the guests,

whether that's through
advertising or through marketing
or the website and to do matching

and things like that, that
are extremely complicated.
But now with AI and gen AI,

you can actually do
those things much easier.
And so this tool's really exciting for us

because it's helping us meet
the guests where they are
and learn more about them

and provide a better
personalized experience for them.
So we take data from all over the place,
whether it's the website

or what they're doing in
our advertising campaigns,
whatever, feed it all into the system
so we can get a better idea who they are

so we can personalize
the journey for them.
(bright music)
